title: Calories in In-N-Out Animal Style Fries
meta_description: Discover in n out animal style fries calories: about 670 kcal per serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including fat, carbs, protein, and tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in In-N-Out Animal Style Fries
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out serving: french fries topped with melted cheese, grilled onions, and Thousand Island-style spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, and customizations; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One serving of In-N-Out Animal Style Fries has 670 kcal, 15 g protein, and 54 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Regular fries (no cheese, onions, or spread)
Protein-style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun/fry base adjustment)

faqs.q: How many calories in In-N-Out Animal Style Fries?
What are the macros for in n out animal style fries calories?
faqs.a: 39 g fat, 54 g carbs (5 g fiber), 1 g sugars, 15 g protein.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out Animal Style Fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1160 mg sodium per serving from cheese and spread.

faqs.q: How do Animal Style Fries compare to regular fries calories?
faqs.a: Animal Style adds ~240 kcal from toppings; regular fries are around 430 kcal.

faqs.q: Can I customize In-N-Out Animal Style Fries for fewer calories?
faqs.a: Yes, skip the spread or cheese to reduce by 100-200 kcal.
